summary: Data & AI Leader specialized in Azure Cloud Solutions, Power BI Enterprise rollouts, and Copilot integration strategies.
detailed_summary: With 14+ years of experience, I align perfectly with Microsoft's mission to empower every organization. My expertise in the Azure ecosystem (Synapse, Fabric, AI Studio) and Power BI has driven large-scale transformation at Sonova. I am passionate about leveraging Copilot and Gen AI to redefine productivity.
